description.english: Destroy a fire extinguisher.
description.brazilian: Destrua um extintor de incêndio pela primeira vez.
description.french: Détruisez un extincteur.
description.italian: Distruggi un estintore.
description.spanish: Destruye un extintor.

displayName.french: Un éléphant dans un magasin de porcelaine

description.english: Destroy a stained glass window.
description.brazilian: Destrua uma janela pela primeira vez.
description.french: Détruisez une vitre.
description.italian: Distruggi una vetrata.
description.spanish: Destruye el cristal de una ventana.

description.english: Change the gas cartridge of a forklift.
description.brazilian: Abasteça uma empilhadeira pela primeira vez.
description.french: Changez la bouteille de gaz d'un chariot élévateur.
description.italian: Cambia la bombola di gas di un muletto.
description.spanish: Cambia la bombona de combustible de una carretilla.
description.polish: Zmień butlę gazową w wózku widłowym.

description.english: Drop off a box at the office.
description.german: Liefere einen Karton im Büro ab.
description.brazilian: Entregue a primeira caixa no escritório.
description.french: Déposez une boîte au bureau.
description.italian: Consegna una scatola in ufficio.
description.spanish: Deja una caja en la oficina.

description.english: Deliver your first cargo.
description.brazilian: Entregue a primeira carga.
description.french: Livrez votre première cargaison.
description.italian: Consegna il tuo primo carico di merce.
description.spanish: Entrega tu primera carga.

description.english: Deliver 10 cargoes.
description.brazilian: Entregue 10 cargas pela primeira vez.
description.french: Livrez 10 cargaisons.
description.italian: Consegna 10 carichi di merce.
description.spanish: Entrega diez cargas.

description.english: Reach
description.brazilian: Ganhe a medalha de ouro em todas as missões.
description.french: Décrochez l'or à toutes les missions.
description.italian: Raggiungi il grado Oro in tutte le missioni.
description.spanish: Consigue el oro en todas las misiones.

description.english: Complete all driving tests.
description.brazilian: Complete todas as missões da escola de direção.
description.french: Passez toutes les épreuves de conduite.
description.italian: Completa tutti i test di guida.
description.spanish: Completa todos los exámenes de conducción.

description.english: Complete all main missions of the company The House Depot.
description.german: Absolviere alle Aufträge der Firma The House Depot.
description.brazilian: Complete todas as missões da empresa The House Depot.
description.french: Terminez toutes les missions de l'entreprise House Depot.
description.italian: Completa tutte le missioni della ditta The House Depot.
description.spanish: Completa todas las misiones de la empresa The House Depot.
description.russian: Выполните все задания компании The House Depot.
description.polish: Ukończ wszystkie misje w firmie House Depot.

description.english: Complete all missions of the company IPS.
description.german: Absolviere alle Aufträge der Firma IPS.
description.brazilian: Complete todas as missões da empresa IPS.
description.french: Terminez toutes les missions de l'entreprise IPS.
description.italian: Completa tutte le missioni della ditta IPS.
description.spanish: Completa todas las misiones de la empresa IPS.
description.polish: Ukończ wszystkie misje w firmie IPS.

description.english: Complete all missions of the company Walker Miller.
description.german: Absolviere alle Aufträge der Firma Walker Miller.
description.brazilian: Complete todas as missões da empresa Walker Miller.
description.french: Terminez toutes les missions de l'entreprise Walker Miller.
description.italian: Completa tutte le missioni della ditta Walker Miller.
description.spanish: Completa todas las misiones de la empresa Walker Miller.
description.russian: Выполните все задания компании Walker Miller.
description.polish: Ukończ wszystkie misje w firmie Walker Miller.

description.english: Damage a box.
description.brazilian: Destrua uma caixa pela primeira vez.
description.french: Endommagez une boîte.
description.italian: Danneggia una scatola.
description.spanish: Daña una caja.

description.english: Drive 10 km with a forklift.
description.brazilian: Dirija 10KM com uma empilhadeira.
description.french: Roulez 10 km à bord d'un chariot élévateur.
description.italian: Percorri 10 km con un muletto.
description.spanish: Recorre 10 km con una carretilla elevadora.

description.english: Travel 3 km with the electric pallet truck.
description.german: Lege 3 km mit dem Elektrohubwagen zurück.
description.brazilian: Opere uma paleteira elétrica por 3KM.
description.french: Parcourez 3 km avec le transpalette électrique.
description.italian: Percorri 3 km con il transpallet elettrico.
description.spanish: Recorre 3 km con una transpaleta eléctrica.
description.russian: Проделайте 3 километра на электрической тележке для поддонов.

description.english: Roll over with the forklift.
description.brazilian: Capote a empilhadeira pela primeira vez.
description.french: Faites se retourner le chariot élévateur.
description.italian: Ribaltati con il muletto.
description.spanish: Vuelca con una carretilla elevadora.

description.english: Place all boxes on a pallet.
description.german: Platziere alle Kartons auf einer Palette.
description.brazilian: Arrume as caixas no palete pela primeira vez.
description.french: Placez toutes les boîtes sur une palette.
description.italian: Metti tutte le scatole su un pallet.
description.spanish: Coloca todas las cajas en un palé.

description.english: Place a box correctly on the pallet.
description.german: Platziere einen Karton korrekt auf der Palette.
description.brazilian: Arrume a posição da caixa pela primeira vez.
description.french: Placez une boîte correctement sur la palette.
description.italian: Metti correttamente una scatola sul pallet.
description.spanish: Coloca una caja correctamente en el palé.

description.english: Transport 10 cargoes with the electric pallet truck.
description.brazilian: Transporte 10 cargas usando a paleteira eletrica.
description.french: Transportez 10 cargaisons avec le transpalette électrique.
description.italian: Trasporta 10 carichi di merce con il transpallet elettrico.
description.spanish: Transporta diez cargas con la transpaleta eléctrica.
description.polish: Przewieź 10 ładunków przy użyciu elektrycznego wózka paletowego.

description.english: Get all the awards.
description.brazilian: Ganhou todos os troféus.
description.french: Obtenez tous les succès.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti gli achievement.
description.spanish: Consigue todos los logros.

description.english: Destroy a glass window, a fire extinguisher, and damage 3 boxes.
description.german: Zerstöre ein Glasfenster, einen Feuerlöscher und beschädige 3 Kartons.
description.brazilian: Quebre uma janela, um extintor de incêndio e 3 caixas.
description.french: Détruisez une vitre et un extincteur, et endommagez 3 boîtes.
description.italian: Distruggi una vetrata e un estintore e danneggia 3 scatole.
description.spanish: Destruye el cristal de una ventana y un extintor, y daña tres cajas.
description.russian: Разбейте витраж, уничтожьте огнетушитель и повредите 3 коробки.
description.polish: Zniszcz szybę oraz gaśnicę i uszkodź trzy pudła.,

description.english: Driving the vehicle for the first time.
description.brazilian: Dirija o veículo pela primeira vez.
description.french: Conduisez un véhicule pour la première fois.
description.italian: Guida il veicolo per la prima volta.
description.spanish: Conduce un vehículo por primera vez.
description.russian: Сядьте за руль транспорта в первый раз.

description.english: Descend a slope backwards.
description.brazilian: Descendo a ladeira de ré.
description.french: Prenez une pente en marche arrière.
description.italian: Scendi lungo un pendio in retromarcia.
description.spanish: Desciende una pendiente marcha atrás.

description.english: Place a cargo on top of another cargo.
description.german: Platziere eine Ladung auf einer anderen Ladung.
description.brazilian: Colocar uma carga em cima da outra.
description.french: Placez une cargaison par-dessus une autre.
description.italian: Metti un carico di merce sopra un altro carico.
description.spanish: Coloca una carga sobre otra carga.

description.english: Enter the storage room.
description.brazilian: Troque o combustível pela primeira vez.
description.french: Entrez dans la réserve.
description.italian: Entra nel magazzino.
description.spanish: Entra en el almacén.

description.english: Use the electric pallet truck.
description.brazilian: Opere a paleteira eletrica pela primeira vez.
description.french: Utilisez le transpalette électrique.
description.italian: Usa il transpallet elettrico.
description.spanish: Usa la transpaleta eléctrica.

description.english: Pick up a cargo with the electric pallet truck.
description.german: Nimm eine Ladung mit dem Elektrohubwagen auf.
description.brazilian: Pegue a primeira carga com a paleteira elétrica.
description.french: Ramassez une cargaison avec le transpalette électrique.
description.italian: Prendi un carico di merce con il transpallet elettrico.
description.spanish: Recoge una carga con la transpaleta eléctrica.
description.russian: Поднимите груз с помощью электрической тележки.
description.polish: Podnieś ładunek przy użyciu elektrycznego wózka paletowego.

description.english: Drive the electric forklift.
description.brazilian: Dirija a empilhadeira elétrica pela primeira vez.
description.french: Conduisez le chariot élévateur électrique.
description.italian: Guida il muletto elettrico.
description.spanish: Conduce la carretilla elevadora eléctrica.

description.english: Walk on a grassy area.
description.brazilian: Pisou na grama pela primeira vez.
description.french: Marchez sur un parterre d'herbe.
description.italian: Cammina su un'area erbosa.
description.spanish: Camina por una zona con hierba.

description.english: Hit an employee with a vehicle.
description.brazilian: Atropelou acidentalmente um outro trabalhador.
description.french: Percutez un employé avec votre véhicule.
description.italian: Investi un dipendente con un veicolo.
description.spanish: Atropella a un empleado con un vehículo.

description.english: Complete the quest to place two cargoes within 4 minutes.
description.german: Absolviere den Auftrag zwei Ladungen innerhalb von 4 Minuten zu platzieren.
description.brazilian: Você conseguiu colocar as duas cargas em 4 minutos.
description.french: Terminez la quête consistant à placer deux cargaisons en moins de 4 minutes.
description.italian: Completa la missione di posizionare due carichi di merce entro 4 minuti.
description.spanish: Completa la misión de colocar dos cargas en cuatro minutos.
description.russian: Выполните задание, в котором нужно поместить два груза за 4 минуты.
description.polish: Wykonaj zadanie i przewieź dwa ładunki w ciągu czterech minut.

description.english: Transport the trash container with the forklift.
description.german: Transportiere den Müllcontainer mit dem Gabelstapler.
description.brazilian: Levou a caçamba de lixo com a empilhadeira.
description.french: Transportez le conteneur avec le chariot élévateur.
description.italian: Trasporta il cassonetto dell'immondizia con il muletto.
description.spanish: Transporta el contenedor de basura con la carretilla elevadora.
description.russian: Переместите мусорный контейнер с помощью погрузчика.
description.polish: Przewieź kontener na śmieci przy użyciu wózka widłowego.

description.english: Get Gold in all license D missions.
description.brazilian: Obtenha ouro em todas as missões da licença D.
description.french: Décrochez l'or pour toutes les missions relatives au permis D.
description.italian: Raggiungi il grado Oro in tutte le missioni della patente D.
description.spanish: Consigue el oro en todas las misiones del carnet D.
description.russian: Получите «золотой» статус во всех заданиях на права категории «D»
description.polish: Uzyskaj złoto we wszystkich misjach z kategorii D

description.russian: Получите «серебряный» статус во всех заданиях на права категории «D»
description.polish: Uzyskaj srebro we wszystkich misjach z kategorii D
